verses.verse: Now Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him no <S%H3808><s%> children. <S%H3205><s%> She had a handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Hagar. <S%H1904><s%>

Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "See now, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh has restrained me <S%H6113><s%> from bearing. <S%H3205><s%> Please go in <S%H935><s%> to my handmaid. <S%H8198><s%> It may <S%H194><s%> be that I will obtain children <S%H1129><s%> by her. <S%H87><s%>" Abram listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Sarai. <S%H8297><s%>

Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> the Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> her handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> after <S%H7093><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> had lived <S%H3427><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to Abram <S%H87><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> to be his wife. <S%H802><s%>

He went in <S%H935><s%> to Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> and she conceived. <S%H2029><s%> When she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived, <S%H2029><s%> her mistress <S%H1404><s%> was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "This wrong <S%H2555><s%> is your fault. <S%H5414><s%> I gave my handmaid <S%H8198><s%> into your bosom, <S%H2436><s%> and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived, <S%H2029><s%> I was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes. <S%H5869><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> judge between me and you. <S%H8199><s%>"

But Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> "Behold, <S%H8198><s%> your maid is in your hand. <S%H3027><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> to her whatever is good in your <S%H2896><s%> eyes. <S%H8297><s%>" Sarai dealt harshly with <S%H6031><s%> her, <S%H1272><s%> and she fled from her face. <S%H6440><s%>

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> found her <S%H4672><s%> by a fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Shur. <S%H7793><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%>'s handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> where <S%H335><s%> did you <S%H935><s%> come from? <S%H3212><s%> Where are you going?" She said, <S%H559><s%> "I am fleeing <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of my mistress <S%H1404><s%> Sarai. <S%H8297><s%>"
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H7725><s%> "Return to your mistress, <S%H1404><s%> and submit <S%H6031><s%> yourself under her hands. <S%H3027><s%>"

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H7235><s%> "I will greatly multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed, <S%H2233><s%> that they will not be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>"

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H2009><s%> "Behold, you are with child, <S%H2030><s%> and will bear <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%> You shall call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> your affliction. <S%H6040><s%>

He will be like a wild <S%H6501><s%> donkey <S%H120><s%> among men. <S%H3027><s%> His hand will be against every man, <S%H3027><s%> and every man's hand against him. <S%H7931><s%> He will live opposite <S%H6440><s%> all of his brothers. <S%H251><s%>"

She called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who spoke <S%H1696><s%> to her, <S%H410><s%> "You are a God who sees, <S%H7210><s%>" for she said, <S%H559><s%> "Have I even stayed <S%H1988><s%> alive after seeing <S%H7200><s%> him? <S%H310><s%>"
Therefore the well <S%H875><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Beer <S%H883><s%> Lahai Roi. <S%H6946><s%> Behold, it is between Kadesh and Bered. <S%H1260><s%>

Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> for Abram. <S%H87><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son, <S%H1121><s%> whom Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore, <S%H3458><s%> Ishmael.
Abram <S%H87><s%> was eighty <S%H8084><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> to Abram. <S%H87><s%>
